problems.title: Majority Element II (Hash Table)
problems.description:
Problem Statement

Given an integer array of size n, find all elements that appear more than ⌊ n/3 ⌋ times.
problems.examples:
Example 1:

Input: nums = [3,2,3]
Output: [3]

Example 2:

Input: nums = [1]
Output: [1]

Example 3:

Input: nums = [1,2]
Output: [1,2]

starterCodes.code:

if __name__ == '__main__':
    import sys
    data = sys.stdin.read().strip().split()
    n = int(data[0])
    nums = list(map(int, data[1:]))
    sol = Solution()
    result = sol.majorityElement(nums)
    print(' '.join(map(str, sorted(result))))

hintsList: There can be at most 2 elements that appear more than n/3 times.
Use Boyer-Moore Voting Algorithm with two counters.
